txt.en:
The bounty notice reads:

On behalf of the Queen of Renewed Hamât, Mizâdi Shâra, brave citizens amongst you are asked to seek out and defeat the dread scorpion Tamâhu. Tamâhu has long plagued the lands west of Urmâkh, endangering all the peoples of Imhûlar. Defeat her before her brood spreads and more harm comes to innocent citizens of Urmâkh.

The proof of your triumph shall be her oversized stinger. Bring the twisted weapon to Numûru, Hand of the Queen in Urmâkh for a proper reward.
Defeat Tamâhu and collect her mighty stinger

Mizâdi Shâra, Queen of Renewed Hamât, has posted a bounty seeking skilled hunters to defeat the dread scorpion Tamâhu and return with her mighty stinger. She has last been seen west of Urmâkh, near Dûlagig.

'That is quite the stinger. I wouldn't want to tangle with the beast to whom it was attached. Clearly you know your way around a fight. Please know that the people of Urmâkh will sleep easier tonight because of your valourous deeds. Please accept this reward, you've more than earned it.'
The dread scorpion Tamâhu is harassing citizens and growing her brood west of Urmâkh. You are to defeat her and return to Numûru in Urmâkh with her mighty stinger.
Bring Tamâhu's stinger to Numûru in Urmâkh to collect your reward.
Bring Tamâhu's stinger to Numûru in Urmâkh
